content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-46.5, -119.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at position (-46.5, -119.0)
- Offshore pump at position (-47.5, -123.5)
- Pipe network connecting the boiler and offshore pump, with pipes at positions:
  - (-48.5, -120.5)
  - (-48.5, -121.5)
  - (-46.5, -120.5)
  - (-47.5, -120.5)

### Copper Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position (-19.0, -73.0) with copper plate output

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position (9.0, -64.0) with iron plate output

### Additional Furnace Setup
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position (6.0, -62.0)

### Storage and Inserter Setup
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position (7.5, -61.5)
- Inserter at position (6.5, -60.5) connected to the chest and furnace, currently not receiving power
- Wooden chest at position (6.5, -59.5) storing iron plates

### Lab
- Lab with input of automation science packs, currently not receiving power

### Pipe Networks
- Multiple pipe groups with varying statuses and positions, primarily empty

### Electricity Network
- Small electric poles at various positions, part of an electricity group with no voltage

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Placing Entities
- Ensure there is no existing object in the way before attempting to place a new entity. Check the target location for obstructions.

### Errors with Inserter Power Supply
- Verify that inserters are connected to a power source and receiving electricity. Ensure that the electricity network is properly set up and operational.

### General Tips
- Regularly check the status of all entities to ensure they are functioning as expected and address any warnings or errors promptly.
